text: brrda phu sraththa thanghlay! Cng raksʹa brrda sayya hı khrbthwn theid satw prapheth psusatw nan di thuk xnumati kæ phwk cea læw nxkcak thi cu thuk xan hı phwk cea fang doythi phwk cea michı phu thi hı satw thi ca thuk la nan pen thi xnumati khna thi phwk cea xyu nı xi hrx m thæ cring xallxh nan thrng chikhad tam thi phraxngkh thrng prasngkh
